Current password: Mprempren asɛmfua a wɔde hyɛ mu .
Delete your account and all of its resou: Popa wo akontaabu ne ne nneɛma nyinaa .
Each recovery code can be used once to a: Wobetumi de recovery code biara adi dwuma pɛnkoro de akɔ wo akonta no so na wobeyi afi hɔ bere a wode adi dwuma awie no. Sɛ wuhia pii a, klik Regenerate codes a ɛwɔ atifi hɔ no so.

Enable Two-Factor Authentication: Ma nneɛma abien a wɔde gye di no nyɛ adwuma .
Ensure your account is using a long, ran: Hwɛ sɛ wo akonta no de password tenten a ɛnyɛ nhyehyɛe na ɛredi dwuma na ama woakɔ so ayɛ nea ahobammɔ wom .
Enter the 6-digit code from your authent: Hyehyɛ koodu a ɛwɔ akɔmfo 6 no fi wo Authenticator app no ​​mu.

Enter your details below to create your: Hyehyɛ wo ho nsɛm wɔ ase hɔ na yɛ wo akontaabu .

Once your account is deleted, all of its: Sɛ wopopa wo akontaabu no wie a, ne nneɛma ne ne data nyinaa nso bɛpopa daa. Yɛsrɛ sɛ si so dua sɛ wopɛ sɛ wopopa wo akontaabu no koraa.
Sɛ wɔpopa wo akontaabu no wie a, wɔbɛpopa ne nneɛma ne ne data nyinaa koraa. Yɛsrɛ wo kyerɛw wo password na si so dua sɛ wopɛ sɛ wopopa wo akontaabu no daa.
or, enter the code manually: Anaasɛ, fa nsa hyɛ code no mu .
Please confirm access to your account by: Yɛsrɛ sɛ si so dua sɛ wobɛkɔ wo akontaabu no mu denam wo Emergency Recovery code no biako a wode bɛhyɛ mu no so.
Please enter your new password below: Yɛsrɛ wo kyerɛw wo password foforo no wɔ ase hɔ .
Please verify your email address by clic: Yɛsrɛ sɛ hwɛ sɛ wo email address no yɛ nokware denam link a yɛde email akɔma wo nkyɛe no so.
Recovery codes let you regain access if: Recovery codes ma wo san nya kwan sɛ wo 2FA device no yera a. Fa sie wɔ password manager a ahobammɔ wom mu.
Regenerate Codes: Regenerate code ahorow no san yɛ foforo .
This is a secure area of the application: Eyi yɛ beae a ahobammɔ wɔ wɔ akwammisa krataa no mu. Yɛsrɛ sɛ si wo password no so dua ansa na woatoa so.
To finish enabling two-factor authentica: Sɛ wopɛ sɛ wowie a, fa nneɛma mmienu a ɛkyerɛ sɛ woagye di no, scan QR code no anaa hyɛ Setup key no mu wɔ wo Authenticator app no ​​mu.
Two Factor Authentication: Nneɛma abien a ɛma wogye di .
Two-Factor Auth: Nneɛma a ɛwɔ nneɛma abien mu Auth .
Two-Factor Authentication Enabled: Nneɛma abien a wɔde gye tom a wɔde di dwuma .
Two-factor authentication is now enabled: Mprempren wɔama nneɛma abien a wɔde di adanse no ayɛ adwuma. Scan QR code no anaa hyɛ setup key no mu wɔ wo authenticator app no ​​mu.
Update the appearance settings for your: Yɛ wo akontaabu no ho nhyehyɛe foforo .

Verify Authentication Code: Hwɛ sɛ authentication code no yɛ nokware anaa .
When you enable two-factor authenticatio: Sɛ wo ma two-factor authentication yɛ adwuma a, wɔbɛka akyerɛ wo sɛ pin a ɛyɛ den bere a worekɔ mu no. Wobetumi agye Pin yi afi TOTP-boa application bi so wɔ wo fon so.
With two-factor authentication enabled,: Sɛ wɔma nneɛma abien a ɛkyerɛ sɛ biribi yɛ nokware no yɛ adwuma a, wɔbɛka akyerɛ wo sɛ fa pin a ahobammɔ wom, random bere a worekɔ mu no, a wubetumi agye afi TOTP-boa application a ɛwɔ wo fon so no mu.
